texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · All relevant legislative, statutory, regulatory, contractual requirements and the organization's approach to meet these requirements shall be explicitly identified, documented and kept up to date.
texts.text: All relevant legislative, statutory, regulatory, contractual requirements and the organization's approach to meet these requirements shall be explicitly identified, documented and kept up to date.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Organization shall ensure compliance to Information Security and IT requirements defined in the 'IT Act' (latest) and mandatory cyber security guidelines issued by 'CERT-In' and same shall be reviewed periodically
texts.text: Organization shall ensure compliance to Information Security and IT requirements defined in the 'IT Act' (latest) and mandatory cyber security guidelines issued by 'CERT-In' and same shall be reviewed periodically

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · All employees shall adhere to the policies and procedures to maintain and keep up to date all relevant statutory, regulatory, and contractual requirements.
texts.text: All employees shall adhere to the policies and procedures to maintain and keep up to date all relevant statutory, regulatory, and contractual requirements.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Compliance violations shall be documented, reported and investigated by authorized personnel or team.
texts.text: Compliance violations shall be documented, reported and investigated by authorized personnel or team.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Corporate Audit Team shall supervise and take necessary action in case of any deviation observed.
texts.text: Corporate Audit Team shall supervise and take necessary action in case of any deviation observed.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Compliance with Information Security Policies and Procedures shall be reported to the GILAC Information Security Council on a periodic basis.
texts.text: Compliance with Information Security Policies and Procedures shall be reported to the GILAC Information Security Council on a periodic basis.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · All relevant statutory, regulatory and contractual documents and records shall be retained by resp departments of the Business Units for a period as per the required documentation/contracts.
texts.text: All relevant statutory, regulatory and contractual documents and records shall be retained by resp departments of the Business Units for a period as per the required documentation/contracts.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · A review of compliance with legal and regulatory requirements that affect information security shall be performed regularly and when new legislation or regulatory requirements come into effect.
texts.text: A review of compliance with legal and regulatory requirements that affect information security shall be performed regularly and when new legislation or regulatory requirements come into effect.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: 36.2. Intellectual Property Rights (IPR)
texts.text: 36.2. Intellectual Property Rights (IPR)

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Information Owners shall be responsible for identifying Intellectual Property (IP) that may be used in business processes and corresponding obligations.
texts.text: Information Owners shall be responsible for identifying Intellectual Property (IP) that may be used in business processes and corresponding obligations.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Information Owners shall be responsible for maintaining and retaining proof of entitlement and usage of licenses of identified IP.
texts.text: Information Owners shall be responsible for maintaining and retaining proof of entitlement and usage of licenses of identified IP.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · IP  shall  be  acquired  only  through  Original  Equipment  Manufacturers  (OEMs)  or  authorized resellers and only licensed IP shall be used.
texts.text: IP  shall  be  acquired  only  through  Original  Equipment  Manufacturers  (OEMs)  or  authorized resellers and only licensed IP shall be used.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · IP material protected by copyright shall not be copied, duplicated or converted to another format, in full or in part other than permitted by copyright law.
texts.text: IP material protected by copyright shall not be copied, duplicated or converted to another format, in full or in part other than permitted by copyright law.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Media containing IP shall be removed from or securely overwritten prior to disposing.
texts.text: Media containing IP shall be removed from or securely overwritten prior to disposing.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Information Owners shall disclose the IP owner credentials on the IP utilized for official purposes.
texts.text: Information Owners shall disclose the IP owner credentials on the IP utilized for official purposes.

texts.orig: Godrej Industries Limited and Associate Companies
texts.text: Godrej Industries Limited and Associate Companies

texts.orig: Godrej Information Security Policy
texts.text: Godrej Information Security Policy

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: 36.3. Use of Cryptographic Controls
texts.text: 36.3. Use of Cryptographic Controls

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · GILAC shall ensure that the use of cryptographic controls is compatible to the laws of India and as well as the laws of its clients' country if any.
texts.text: GILAC shall ensure that the use of cryptographic controls is compatible to the laws of India and as well as the laws of its clients' country if any.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: 37. Data Privacy
texts.text: 37. Data Privacy

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: 37.1. Privacy Governance
texts.text: 37.1. Privacy Governance

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Responsibility for privacy and protection of sensitive personal information of all internal / external stakeholders shall be established.
texts.text: Responsibility for privacy and protection of sensitive personal information of all internal / external stakeholders shall be established.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · All Business Units shall designate a Grievance Officer to address privacy related grievances from stakeholder, if applicable.
texts.text: All Business Units shall designate a Grievance Officer to address privacy related grievances from stakeholder, if applicable.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Processes and procedures shall be established to protect Sensitive Personal Information (SPI) in accordance with the applicable compliance requirements.
texts.text: Processes and procedures shall be established to protect Sensitive Personal Information (SPI) in accordance with the applicable compliance requirements.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Organization should consider hiding sensitive data (e.g. PII, SPI, etc.) by using techniques such as data masking, pseudonymization or anonymization taking applicable legislation into consideration.
texts.text: Organization should consider hiding sensitive data (e.g. PII, SPI, etc.) by using techniques such as data masking, pseudonymization or anonymization taking applicable legislation into consideration.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Personal data of stakeholders shall be securely stored, in manual or electronic form in accordance with the applicable compliance requirements.
texts.text: Personal data of stakeholders shall be securely stored, in manual or electronic form in accordance with the applicable compliance requirements.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Privacy Impact Assessments (PIA) shall be conducted by respective Business Units periodically and when changes are anticipated on how sensitive personal information of stakeholders is acquired, stored, used or disclosed.
texts.text: Privacy Impact Assessments (PIA) shall be conducted by respective Business Units periodically and when changes are anticipated on how sensitive personal information of stakeholders is acquired, stored, used or disclosed.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Privacy training shall be administered to all staff and authorized third-party personnel who handle sensitive personal information.
texts.text: Privacy training shall be administered to all staff and authorized third-party personnel who handle sensitive personal information.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Changes to Legal and regulatory landscape related to privacy shall be periodically monitored and any impact from such changes shall be identified and addressed.
texts.text: Changes to Legal and regulatory landscape related to privacy shall be periodically monitored and any impact from such changes shall be identified and addressed.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: 37.2. Notice
texts.text: 37.2. Notice

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · An online privacy notice shall be made available for stakeholders during collection of sensitive personal information.
texts.text: An online privacy notice shall be made available for stakeholders during collection of sensitive personal information.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Privacy notice shall clearly and conspicuously describe how GILAC collects, uses, stores and discloses sensitive personal information.
texts.text: Privacy notice shall clearly and conspicuously describe how GILAC collects, uses, stores and discloses sensitive personal information.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: 37.3. Consent
texts.text: 37.3. Consent

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · GILAC shall obtain the stakeholder consent prior to collection, processing and transfer of sensitive personal information.
texts.text: GILAC shall obtain the stakeholder consent prior to collection, processing and transfer of sensitive personal information.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Upon customer's request, GILAC shall provide mechanisms to correct or amend stakeholder's sensitive personal information.
texts.text: Upon customer's request, GILAC shall provide mechanisms to correct or amend stakeholder's sensitive personal information.

texts.label: page_footer
texts.orig: Godrej Industries Limited and Associate Companies
texts.text: Godrej Industries Limited and Associate Companies

texts.label: page_footer
texts.orig: Page 40 of 41
texts.text: Page 40 of 41

texts.label: page_header
texts.orig: Godrej Information Security Policy
texts.text: Godrej Information Security Policy

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · If the stakeholder withdraws his/her consent to use his/her personal information by GILAC, GILAC shall consider not providing services for which the information was sought, but data will be retained as per legal and regulatory requirements.
texts.text: If the stakeholder withdraws his/her consent to use his/her personal information by GILAC, GILAC shall consider not providing services for which the information was sought, but data will be retained as per legal and regulatory requirements.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: 37.4. Collection and Use
texts.text: 37.4. Collection and Use

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · GILAC shall limit the collection of sensitive personal information that is necessary and relevant for the purposes for which information is being collected.
texts.text: GILAC shall limit the collection of sensitive personal information that is necessary and relevant for the purposes for which information is being collected.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Sensitive personal information shall only be collected by reasonable, lawful and fair means.
texts.text: Sensitive personal information shall only be collected by reasonable, lawful and fair means.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · GILAC shall limit the use of sensitive personal information for the purposes identified in the privacy notice.
texts.text: GILAC shall limit the use of sensitive personal information for the purposes identified in the privacy notice.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: 37.5. Disclosure
texts.text: 37.5. Disclosure

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Sensitive personal information of stakeholders shall only be disclosed for the purposes outlined in the privacy notice.
texts.text: Sensitive personal information of stakeholders shall only be disclosed for the purposes outlined in the privacy notice.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: 37.6. Retention and Destruction
texts.text: 37.6. Retention and Destruction

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Sensitive personal information of stakeholders shall be retained for only as long as necessary to fulfill the stated purpose or based on legal or regulatory requirements.
texts.text: Sensitive personal information of stakeholders shall be retained for only as long as necessary to fulfill the stated purpose or based on legal or regulatory requirements.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: 37.7. Privacy Incidents and Grievances
texts.text: 37.7. Privacy Incidents and Grievances

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Incidents that involve misuse, unauthorized access or disclosure of sensitive personal information shall be categorized and handled as privacy incidents.
texts.text: Incidents that involve misuse, unauthorized access or disclosure of sensitive personal information shall be categorized and handled as privacy incidents.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Grievance Officer shall address stakeholder privacy related complaints in accordance with legal or regulatory requirements.
texts.text: Grievance Officer shall address stakeholder privacy related complaints in accordance with legal or regulatory requirements.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: 38. Responsible Parties
texts.text: 38. Responsible Parties

texts.label: text
texts.orig: There should be documented standards and procedures for managing the asset lifecycle. The owner of this policy is the Group CISO, who shall be responsible for the maintenance and updating of the policy document.
texts.text: There should be documented standards and procedures for managing the asset lifecycle. The owner of this policy is the Group CISO, who shall be responsible for the maintenance and updating of the policy document.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: While  Group  CISO  is  the  owner  of  this  policy,  he/she  can  utilize  various  departments  within  the organization to implement, enforce and support this policy.
texts.text: While  Group  CISO  is  the  owner  of  this  policy,  he/she  can  utilize  various  departments  within  the organization to implement, enforce and support this policy.

texts.text: Godrej Industries Limited and Associate Companies
